
                            
                            <p> <br>  <br> 握C ，什么情况？ 昨天上班没有关注这些东西，就看头条说什么下跌之类的话题，今天一看？ <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/default/funk.gif" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/default/funk.gif">&nbsp;&nbsp;<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/default/funk.gif" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/default/funk.gif">&nbsp; &nbsp;<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/default/funk.gif" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/default/funk.gif">&nbsp; &nbsp; <br>  <br> 本来也没有涨啊，怎么还会爆跌？ <br>  <br>  <br>  <br>  <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/08/101133fdd7o299wz7bhgu2.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/08/101133fdd7o299wz7bhgu2.png"> <br> </p><p class="pl">大a昨天啥情况你不知道吗</p><p class="pl">今天反弹了，都赚回来了</p><p class="pl">股市冥灯<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1033.gif" alt="打开支寸宝，看昨日收益，被吓了一跳 - 0818团" title="打开支寸宝，看昨日收益，被吓了一跳 - 0818团"></p>大a昨天啥情况你不知道吗一天跌这么多的，从来没有过<p class="pl">只要不卖掉就不算亏</p><p class="pl">还要跌3000，在等2500抄底</p><p class="pl">昨天5000股跌&nbsp;&nbsp;3000+股跌停</p><p class="pl">能放进鸡金资产有二十多W,超过90%的吧友</p><p class="pl">别慌，今天涨回来</p><p class="pl">还是有钱人，不在乎这么点钱</p><p></p>
